Topic.Title: adding models to the 'help' bar in desktop

Posts.EditableText:
Hey! I'm new into Squiffy, and a used Quest 'bout an year now, and to learn more, i wanted to show examples from all documentation of Squiffy in the 'help' bar

Someone know's how to do it?

thanks from now

Posts.EditableText:
What, you want to put the information from help into a squiffy gamebook? Is this a tutorial thing?

The kludgy way would be to cut and paste the documentation into sections and have them user accessible.
